component.name: PianoCheetah
component.summary: Steve's weird midi sequencer for pop piano n drum

description.p: It's for playing and practicing a song on piano and drums. Shows notes in a "pianoroll" format that's a little bit fancy.

You practice the piano parts and the background tracks sync to your tempo. Getting a song into your head and fingers is the aim.
The real notes of the song can be simplifed down to one note per hand max. And your hands can stay in one position.
